thread.title: Anyone accidentally bought a tank recently ?
thread.title_full: Anyone accidentally bought a tank recently ?

title: Anyone accidentally bought a tank recently ?
text: Yesterday (22:03) Jasandjules said: Well, I'd say many people have drunk purchased on ebay. But he's up there in the top three Oh yesBut seriously there may be covenants on his property preventing him having such a thing on his drive. In my street you are not allowedCaravansMotor homesWork vans - strictly for actual building work on your property. But if you are a builder or in need of such a vehicle for your job you need to park elsewhere. Now it's debatable as to how that would be enforced A- guess formal letter to the council referring to the covenant on the deeds. Clearly you'd be fking off your neighbour though you'd never know who did or didn't in the street.
